CustomField.description: Please describe the language understood by your child
CustomField.label: HLS2 Language Understanding

value.fullName: Understands mostly English and some of the home language.
value.label: Understands mostly English and some of the home language.

value.fullName: Understands mostly the home language and some English.
value.label: Understands mostly the home language and some English.

value.fullName: Understands only the home language and no English.
value.label: Understands only the home language and no English.

value.fullName: Understands the home language and English equally.
value.label: Understands the home language and English equally.
